text: Sikkhamānāya bhikkhave bhikkhuniyā aññātabbaṃ paripucchitabbaṃ paripañhitabbaṃ ayaṃ tattha sāmīci
edit: Sikkhamānāya bhikkhave bhikkhuniyā aññātabbaṃ paripucchitabbaṃ paripañhitabbaṃ ayaṃ tattha sāmīci

translations.transtext: Bhikkhus, [the Buddha is apparently addressing the bhikkhus who will inform the bhikkhunīs of this training rule]a bhikkhunī in training should understand, should ask, should ponder. This is the proper course here.
